name: Defence of the Baby-Pumpkins
description:
Ähm, because of the deadline of this project a few bugfixes couldn't make it into this release. Mainly that the game only works every second time you start it. Yeahhh and that sometimes the villain becomes invisible. This will be fixed soon(TM)!

Created for the "Blocks of Jam" - Game Jam with the Armory Game Engine

You need to prevent Jack from murdering the babys with his axe! They need to get to school! Control the log with A/D to block his axes and kamikaze-launch yourself with your mouse on him to deter him. Submit your high-score in the comments!
